EmailTemplate.name: Wrong state
EmailTemplate.subject: Wrong state
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for placing your Name Change order with LegalZoom, America's #1 online legal source.
We have received your order for the state of [state]. Based on the state of residency you have listed on your questionnaire, your name change will need to be filed in [state]. Your current order #[XXXXX] will be cancelled and a refund will be issued to your account. Please return to LegalZoom's website at www.legalzoom.com to complete a new order for the state of [state]. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may cause.
If you have any questions, please call us toll-free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone} {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
We truly appreciate your business and look forward to serving your future legal document needs.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
